meanings.definition: A type of fungus that produces spores on basidia.
meanings.sent1: The basidiomycete released tiny spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study basidiomycetes to learn more about fungi.
meanings.sent3: The basidiomycete threw a spore party, inviting all its fungal friends.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the basidiomycete stood tall like a spore-bearing tree.
meanings.sent5: The basidiomycete's spores danced in the wind, creating a magical sight.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Basidiomycota division of fungi.
meanings.sent1: I found a basidiomycete while exploring the woods.
meanings.sent2: Basidiomycetes play an important role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The basidiomycete family reunion was a fungi-filled affair.
meanings.sent4: The basidiomycete kingdom ruled over the forest floor.
meanings.sent5: The basidiomycete community thrived in the damp forest environment.
